title: Alright, we need something clarified here mods; What exactly qualifies for the "Mature Content" bar?
body:
Because of all places, this is where your moderation is the worst. For months, the "mature content" bar seems to be "Wherever the fuck the mod on duty feels it is at that particular hour". Especially since your moderation, even for one person seems to be random on the best of days.

For example I've had this thread *for literal months*:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/xY5Ytl8i-monster-musume-is-getting-an-anime

And it didn't get a single warning or content removed. 

But THIS picture that was in my last thread?

http://img \ ur.co \ m  /

(Remove the \ if you want to see if) got me a 1 day suspension.

By the logic used to give me a suspension for that, I should get a suspension for posting these;

http://i.imgur.com/WKbaxim.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/Jv8h29Z.jpg



Even though they're official artwork by Riot that is exactly the same level of "risque" that I got suspended for. And what about cosplay? Cosplay falls 100% under what is supposed to be allowed under GD's discussion - but apparently according to the logic you've removed and suspended from topics, Tasha's Syndra cosplay:

http://i.imgur.com/ATyFrcy.jpg

And Enji Night's Nidalee cosplay -

http://i.imgur.com/hxE4Wd5.png

Aren't allowed *even though they are 100% accurate to the characters in-game*. So what is the standard mods, when the things you're removing from the boards are the same or sometimes even tamer than things *that are two clicks away on the same website you're removing from?*

**OH HAI THERE, FROST QUEEN JANNA SPLASH ART!**

http://i.imgur.com/IB8AjOO.jpg


{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 


HOLY FUCKING SHIT MODS. ARE YOU SERIOUS?

http://i.imgur.com/zEzGwRQ.png

That Bayonetta pic was A: Not anymore risque than *the video in the goddamn OP*, but B: WAS MADE BY MOTHERLOVIN' ZERONIS, A GODDAMN CONCEPT ARTIST FOR RIOT. THE GUY RESPONSIBLE FOR THE OFFICER VI AND DEMON VI CONCEPT ART:

http://imgur.com/a/aZY4E
http://imgur.com/xthVQyA.png

You literally just said the artwork done by a **RIOT EMPLOYEE IS INAPPROPRIATE FOR THE RIOT BOARDS.**
